div.div: In August of 2020, Molalla River School District will implement an online student verification system through ParentVUE. READ MORE... about Verify Your Student's Information Online!
MRSD's Continuous Pursuit of Excellence for All Students

The District’s Continuous Improvement Plan was presented to the school board on November 21st. This plan was designed according to our students’ learning and social-emotional needs. READ MORE... about MRSD's Continuous Pursuit of Excellence for All Students

Embracing the shared responsibility between parents, educators and the community-at-large, the Molalla River School District Board of Directors passed the following resolution in support of ALL children in our diverse community. READ MORE... about Resolution for ALL Children

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: large; font-family: arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Cambria; text-align: left;

span.style: background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254); font-family: Arial; color: black;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
p.span: The Board of Directors of Molalla River School District is engaged in a performance review of the District's operations and the evaluation of the Superintendent's performance. As members of the community you have an opportunity for observation about what works and what does not work in the District. The School Board is very interested in your observations. Your responses are being submitted to a collector outside the school district and therefore will be submitted without the use of any names. The collective responses will be submitted to the School Board by the collector for consideration in future planning and in their preparation of the annual Superintendent evaluation.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
p.span: Please click on the link below and complete the questionnaire. Deadline for completion is 5:00 pm Thursday, April 30, 2020. Thank you for taking a few minutes to complete the questionnaire.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

p.strong: Division 22 Standards for Public Schools: 2018-2019 Assurance

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: black;

span.span: to report to their communities the district’s standing with respect to all of the Standards for Public Elementary and Secondary Schools as set out in Oregon Administrative Rules Chapter 581, Division 22.
At the school board meeting on January 23, 2020, Mr. Mann presented his report on the

with each of these requirements.

div.p: Non-discrimination Notice: Molalla River School District recognizes the diversity and worth of all individuals and groups in our society. It is the policy of the Molalla River School District Board of Education that all educational programs, activities and employment will be free of discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, parental or marital status, or age.
